Title: Example of different Validations
Subtitle: Please enter some text into the text input field to change the value and click outside of the text input field or press the Enter key to trigger the validation. Refresh the tab to reset the values.
Description: For implementation reference check StringExtended.js where the String type is extended, Main.view.xml where the new type is used and Component.js where the new type is initialized.
StringPlaceholder: Strings with white spaces are allowed
StringExtendedPlaceholder: The custom validation will set the validity state to error for strings that contain only white spaces
